docker.name: RUN
docker.args: apt-get update   && apt-get install -y binutils curl mono-devel ca-certificates-mono fsharp mono-vbnc nuget referenceassemblies-pcl   && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/*
docker.raw: RUN apt-get update   && apt-get install -y binutils curl mono-devel ca-certificates-mono fsharp mono-vbnc nuget referenceassemblies-pcl   && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/*
